info.name: Brahmakosh Complete API
info.description:
Comprehensive API Collection for Brahmakosh E-Commerce Backend.

**Setup**:
1. Import into Postman.
2. Run 'Auth > Login (User/Admin)'.
3. Token is auto-saved to variables.
4. Access all Protected & Admin routes.

item.name: Get Mobile Home Data
item.description:
Returns a comprehensive data structure for the mobile home screen including:
- Trending Products (Top 5)
- New Arrivals (Top 5)
- Highlighted Products (Top 5)
- Full Category Tree: Categories -> Subcategories -> Latest Products (Top 10)

item.name: Get Categories Tree
item.description: Returns the full hierarchy of active categories and their subcategories.

item.name: Get Products (Mobile)
item.description: Paginated list of products with filters for category, subcategory, and keyword search.

item.name: Get Product Details
item.description: Returns full details for a single product.
